LightningComponentBundle.description: A customizable footer with action buttons for Flow screens.

property.name: actionLinks
property.label: Action Links (JSON)
property.description: JSON array of action buttons with properties: name, label, variant, iconName, iconPosition, navigate, url, target, visible

property.name: showNext
property.label: Show Next/Finish Button
property.description: Show auto-generated Next or Finish button

property.name: nextLabel
property.label: Next Button Label
property.description: Custom label for Next/Finish button (defaults to 'Next' or 'Finish')

property.name: previousLabel
property.label: Previous Button Label
property.description: Custom label for Previous button (defaults to 'Previous')

property.name: nextVariant
property.label: Next Button Variant
property.description: Button variant: base, neutral, brand, brand-outline, destructive, destructive-text, inverse, success

property.name: previousVariant
property.label: Previous Button Variant
property.description: Button variant: base, neutral, brand, brand-outline, destructive, destructive-text, inverse, success

property.name: alignment
property.label: Button Alignment
property.description: Alignment of buttons: left, center, or right

property.name: actionClicked
property.label: Action Clicked
property.description: Output: Name of the action button that was clicked

property.name: displayAsGroup
property.label: Display Buttons as Group
property.description: When enabled, buttons are displayed as a grouped set.

property.name: footerMeta
property.label: Footer Meta Text
property.description: Optional meta text to display in the footer.

property.name: showFooterMeta
property.label: Show Footer Meta
property.description: When enabled, displays the footer meta text if provided.
